tweet:
Glad to announce these grants.  Low income housing is a major issue and we need to support more projects like the ones in our district.  

 https://payne.house.gov/press-release/rep-payne-jr-announces-more-3-million-local-low-income-housing-grants … pic.twitter.com/Pcu5nxROUE

During Rosh Hashanah, people often greet each other by saying "L'shana tova," which means "for a good year."

Happy New Year to all those celebrating #RoshHashanah! pic.twitter.com/bdLckHGZ53

I read the transcript of Pres. Trump's call to Ukraine's president and it seems pretty clear what he tried to accomplish.  

I am outraged that we have a president who behaves in such a manner!  I had to express it on the House floor last night. 

 https://www.c-span.org/video/?c4819664/payne-jr-upset-trumps-conduct … pic.twitter.com/4DrvvB24sS

Extremely honored that Berkeley College named the library in their Newark campus after my father, Donald Payne, Sr.  

I received a plaque today with pictures of the dedication ceremony from Teri Duda, senior vice president of Government Relations for Berkeley College. pic.twitter.com/jFqCGKvJ6S

Busy day supporting children!  I met with New Jersey Education Association officials and students with Jack and Jill of America, a group producing the next generation of African-American leaders.  

I am proud to support groups that improve the lives of children every day! pic.twitter.com/GOYN6ilGKY
We would just like to congratulate Infinity Institute on their Blue Ribbon Designation from the Department of Education. They are one of ten schools in New Jersey to receive the award this year.

We heard moving testimony today from Lauren Hogg, a survivor of the Parkland shooting. 

As chairman of the Subcommittee on Emergency Preparedness..., I want to protect all our children from future acts of domestic terrorism.  

NO child should have to go to school in fear! pic.twitter.com/PJiTjtlW7N

Trump wants to kick millions of low income workers, disabled, elderly, and even schoolchildren off food stamps, known as SNAP.  How can anyone attack the most vulnerable Americans?  This is NOT how I was raised and does NOT represent the country I love.  

 https://www.c-span.org/video/?c4819102/payne-jr-hammers-trump-snap … pic.twitter.com/aQl1L7sJDt

Proud to introduce today's briefing on prostate cancer treatments.  

As Co-Chair of the Congressional Men's Health Caucus, I am always looking for ways to bring more attention and resources to a disease that affects more than 3 million American men. pic.twitter.com/fY3IgI8fSO

My offices received dozens of calls to impeach Pres. Trump after his call to Ukraine's president.  

Speaker Pelosi showed great courage when she launched this historic inquiry.  We need to hold our President accountable.  No one is above the law! pic.twitter.com/KWtv7LyWOw

I wanted to post my tribute to Dr. Emily Clyburn, wife of House Majority Whip James Clyburn yesterday.

She was a classy, generous and brilliant woman.  I was proud to honor her in this way.  

 https://www.c-span.org/video/?c4819039/rep-payne-jrs-tribute-dr-emily-clyburn … pic.twitter.com/brZsRAkG2b

My office was proud to participate in the Essex County Senior Wellness Day today to discuss the services we offer, from Medicare applications to protection from identity theft.  

Please contact my office if you have any questions or need assistance at (973) 645-3213.  Thank you! pic.twitter.com/NggRh0zPPX

I got a chance to practice my passing skills and talk with supporters of the Kessler Foundation during their 18th annual Stroll N' Roll yesterday.  It was a great event and I look forward to doing it again next year. pic.twitter.com/x2jDcSkTn0

Congrats to Priscilla Gardner on her retirement after 50 years with the Jersey City Free Public Library.  She has been a benefit to that library and the entire community.

Good luck in retirement.  I know that city will miss your efforts!!! pic.twitter.com/9vwljUi5iV

Sad to hear of the passing of Emily Clyburn, longtime wife of House Majority Whip James Clyburn from South Carolina.

She was a smart, classy woman and the driving force behind much of her husband's success.  My thoughts and prayer go to James and all of the Clyburn family. pic.twitter.com/CjmGNdS4el

GM workers gave up a lot to keep GM going after bankruptcy, but doesn't want to give it back now that it's making billions.    

I support equal pay and increased wage bills so we don't produce goods in America that American workers can't afford. https://www.nydailynews.com/opinion/ny-oped-why-the-gm-strike-matters-20190920-c5lcdbq4bjcrjbklv2kbbyjegy-story.html …

It was a great day today!  I got to preside over the House of Representatives and received plenty of compliments about my performance from colleagues.  

Let me know what you think of my photos from this afternoon? pic.twitter.com/49TFABpJMJ

Today, I get the gavel!  

I am excited to preside over the House of Representatives as Speaker Pro Tempore this afternoon at 2 p.m. pic.twitter.com/KdR62kNF9L

I am proud to have my friend... Pastor Bryant Ali... serve as guest Chaplain in the House of Representatives today!  

I am excited to hear his prayer and enjoy lunch with a great member of our district. pic.twitter.com/OPUy7nFCBG

Great to meet with the Mental Health Association of Essex and Morris today.  Mental health is an area that doesn't get nearly enough attention or funding.  I am a big supporter, but I wanted to listen and discuss how I could support them further. pic.twitter.com/2GfgK2Ylgz

As we have found in Flint and Newark, clean water is a fundamental human need.  Americans rely on rivers and streams to supply clean drinking water to their families. Yet, the Trump EPA is rolling back clean water protections.  It makes no sense at all!!! 
#ProtectOurWater

It's National Cheeseburger Day!!  

Make sure you take advantage of special deal on cheeseburgers for a great lunch today at participating restaurants.  

 https://www.usatoday.com/story/money/food/2019/09/17/national-cheeseburger-day-get-free-burgers-and-deals-sept-18/2314819001/ … pic.twitter.com/BZWBsiqsvL

Great to hear from our veterans! Today, I spoke with members of Common Defense, a group of vets dedicated to the protections of our freedoms. We are both anti-Trump because his actions violate the very principles of our democracy, such as freedom and equality for all! pic.twitter.com/45NG0kBOJw

Proud of the work the Newark Water Coalition is doing and support them completely.   

This is my water, too!  I was glad to speak with neighbors when I helped distribute bottled water to help get them the clean water they deserve. https://popularresistance.org/newark-water-coalition-takes-struggle-against-lead-pipes-statewide/ …

Sad to see Cokie Roberts died today.  She was considered a "Founding Mother" of NPR.  We could use more people with her bipartisan spirit on the Hill today.  

 https://www.npr.org/2019/09/17/761050916/cokie-roberts-pioneering-female-journalist-who-helped-shape-npr-dies-at-75 … pic.twitter.com/O35pGpoTYn

FREE MUSEUM TICKETS THIS WEEKEND!!  

You and a guest could enjoy one of the 31 New Jersey museums for free this Saturday.  Just go to the link below and take in our state's culture.  Enjoy!

   https://www.smithsonianmag.com/museumday/search/?q=&states=US::NJ& … pic.twitter.com/Nci3dBT1VH

I wanted to let everyone know it is Hispanic Heritage Month from Sept. 15 - Oct. 15.  Let's celebrate all the ways Latinos contribute to our diverse culture!  

 https://www.hispanicheritagemonth.gov/  pic.twitter.com/emEULlzqnh

Glad to hear at least three Presidential candidates support gun buyback programs.  My Safer Neighborhoods Gun Buyback Act would pay gun owners a premium for their assault weapons.  We need to keep military weapons out of civilian and criminal hands! https://www.cbsnews.com/live-news/third-democratic-debate-2019-presidential-primary-candidates-health-care-and-immigration/ …
Great to stop by and support my friends at the U.S. African Development Foundation! pic.twitter.com/UffrNe8gvt
Today I voted to save the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge! I'm excited to support continued conservation and the health of our planet. pic.twitter.com/ZsTArhCFk3

I love this photo!  Thanks Donna Williams, coucilmember for the City of Orange Township, and her group of high school students from East Orange.  Always great to meet more of our district youth! pic.twitter.com/UfV3LFJzvY

For all my Twitter followers, feel free to follow me on Instagram and Facebook as well..

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/DonaldPayneJr/ 

Instagram:  repdonaldpaynejr

Thank you.  These connections make it easier for me to tell you what's going on here.

I'm a strong supporter of children's education and workplace diversity.  Last night, I received awards for my fight for both causes.  It was a busy night, but I was glad to make both events! pic.twitter.com/8muJrPVYeJ

Great to speak with Dr. Lamont Repollet, New Jersey's Commissioner of Education, today.  Recently, his school system was named the best  one nationwide.  I'm proud of their focus on African-American history in their curriculum.  Great job, gentlemen!

 https://www.nj.com/news/2019/09/nj-has-the-best-public-schools-in-the-nation-ranking-says.html … pic.twitter.com/Eruc2B63ls

I was excited to visit two different distribution facilities to help my neighbors get bottled water.  This is a crisis and I wanted to discuss what more I could do to help them get the clean water they need quickly and permanently. pic.twitter.com/rTjPONxMcm
I want to honor all those citizens who lost their lives on that tragic day 18 years ago.  God Bless them and God Bless America! pic.twitter.com/1P5yARUbdH

Excited to be with our House leader, Nancy Pelosi, at today's commemoration of 400 years since the first enslaved Africans arrived in America!  

Thank you, Nancy and all of my colleagues for attending today's event.  We have a great team working to better America! pic.twitter.com/rMGDOH7oIZ

I am excited to promote PAD awareness in Congress. It is easy to treat with simple activities like walking to avoid unnecssary amputations.  We need to make more people aware of that. 

 https://payne.house.gov/press-release/payne-jr-promotes-pad-awareness-during-honorary-month …

Photo courtesy of American College of Cardiology website. pic.twitter.com/uN7xzKwdSV

In committee today, one expert witness on national security issues said that terrorists tell each other to buy guns in the U.S. because it is so easy.  This has got to stop! 
That's why I support background checks and authored a national gun buy-back bill.

I am incredibly proud of these students and their mural. They are standing up for the right to go to school in peace!

What does the local GOP want... to protect the right to keep them from going to school in peace? https://www.northjersey.com/story/news/essex/montclair/2019/09/05/montclair-republican-club-gun-rights-mural-student-never-again-gun-control-mural-nj-transit/2204780001/ …
Great to see Jersey City's new bike lanes!!!! https://www.nj.com/hudson/2019/09/jersey-city-unveils-new-half-mile-bike-lane-along-bergen-avenue.html …

It is time for Congress to support my bill to close the "Medicare loophole."  More than 800 advocates know that this loophole could keep seniors from getting important colorectal cancer screenings! https://fightcolorectalcancer.org/

Great to be in Pittsburgh to hear solutions to gun violence.  Now we need to enact their ideas at the national level.  I continue to introduce my Safer Neighborhoods Gun Buyback Act for this reason.  It has worked locally and it will work nationally!! 

 https://triblive.com/local/pittsburgh-allegheny/pittsburgh-leaders-share-ideas-with-congressional-committee-about-stemming-the-epidemic-of-violence/ … pic.twitter.com/826ZdDynri

Extremely upsetting to see Pres. Trump rob national defense projects that actually protect Americans to fund his border wall... which will do very little to stop the current illegal immigration issue. https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/national-security/pentagon-tells-congress-which-projects-it-will-defund-to-pay-for-trumps-wall/2019/09/04/5b2a50fe-cf34-11e9-9031-519885a08a86_story.html …

Congratulations to Neal Henderson!! He formed the oldest minority hockey program in the U.S. and now he is in the Hockey Hall of Fame!  Well deserved!! https://www.ushockeyhalloffame.com/news_article/show/1046320 …

Here is a better explanation of my work with our new PAD caucus.  We need to stop unnecessary amputations!!!! https://thehill.com/blogs/congress-blog/healthcare/459902-lawmakers-are-bringing-pad-awareness-to-congress …
Extremely proud of my work to support PAD and appreciate the recognition from medical professionals as well!!!! https://www.pr.com/press-release/793711 …

September is Suicide Prevention Awareness month.  Suicides have increased dramatically in this country, particularly with veterans.

So take a moment today and call an old friend or family member to show you care.  You'll get more than you'll give. 

 https://www.nami.org/get-involved/awareness-events/suicide-prevention-awareness-month …
Excited to know my district staff are donating time to hand out water bottles to Newark residents.  I am proud to have a staff that is so dedicated to our community! pic.twitter.com/hibRajLJYR

But again, my thoughts and prayers are with the families and friends of victims in Midland and Odessa today.  I am angry that we have a bill sitting in the Senate that could be saving people.  We need to stop these senseless attacks on our citizens now!!

#Saveourcitizens

Proof that background checks work!  They denied the Odessa murderer a gun before he bought it elsewhere.  TX Gov. said we need to keep guns out of the hands of criminals.  Strong background checks are a good start! https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2019/09/03/texas-shooting-gunman-weapons-background-check/2195417001/ …
